Title: SweetConfig - WebDeploy style config transformations
Description: SweetConfig transforms config files in the style of WebDeploy,, allowing services etc to have app config transformed on deployment.
HomeWiki:
SweetConfig transforms xml files (such has config files) using the same method / formats as WebDeploy.
This allows services (and other none web projects) to have their config replaced with environment specific (i.e. dev, staging) values at deployment time.

Usage

SweetConfig "parameters.xml filename" "setparameters.xml filename" "source xml filename" "transformed xml filename"

parameters.xml : File defines the parameters to be replaced with an xpath location and an optional default value.
setparamters.xml : Files defines the value of parameters specified in the parameters.xml. Each environment would have it's own setparameters.xml file.

See http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ff398068(v=vs.110).aspx for examples of parameters and setpararmeters xml.
